title: (x) Uvular Angioedema - FF Quadraat {Fabio Augusto}
content: this typeface is used in the new england journal of medicine. what is it? is it a garamond? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023033155im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/14793.jpg)
author: timmy

comments.content: The scan is awfully rough, but the a looks awfully Garamondish.
